Name: The Long Shot
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: A simple variation on William Schmidt's Alabazam .
History: Created in 2007 by Julian de Feral at Milk & Honey, London , England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Long Shot contains 175 calories
Garnish: Orange slice & lemon wedge. Serve with a straw.
